function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible virus spread among construction workers","Impact":"Health consequences for construction workers, potential spread to the community","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures, provide testing and treatment, enforce contact tracing","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, testing facilities, contact tracing apps","People":"Construction workers, their families, community","Owner":"Government, construction companies, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of effective health measures for construction workers","Impact":"Increased risk of pandemic impact, higher rates of virus carriage","Mitigation":"Develop and enforce health protocols, provide access to medical care and testing","Technologies":"Medical testing kits, PPE, health monitoring systems","People":"Construction workers, on-site medical staff, public health agencies","Owner":"Government, construction companies, medical institutions"},{"Description":"Socioeconomic impacts of the pandemic on the construction industry","Impact":"Disruption of construction projects, economic downturn, loss of livelihood for workers","Mitigation":"Implement financial support programs, prioritize health and safety in construction projects, adopt remote work where possible","Technologies":"Financial aid systems, remote work technologies, health and safety protocols","People":"Construction workers, contractors, project managers","Owner":"Government, construction companies, financial institutions"}]}
